data.name: 祖母的礼物/Grandmother's gift
data.detailed_description:
『Tomorrow is Winnie's 12th birthday, but when she wakes up, she seems to have entered another world, incredible dolls, people who have long since passed away, is all this a dream or a reality?』

◆ "Grandma's Gift" is an exploration puzzle game. Players can use the props obtained to think about how to use related items, how to open the way, and escape
the pursuit of the enemy. In the process, you will meet different people, encounter different things, and you can choose your future destiny.


〖Game Features〗


■ Classic RPG exploration and puzzle game, with a lot of different difficulty decryption elements.

■ Multiple options, multiple endings. The options of the plot in the game are determined by the character of the protagonist, which may change the difficulty and ending of the game, or even end the game early.

■ Classic pixel game, the overall picture is cartoonish, retro style, weird atmosphere but cute.

■ Rich plots, unique characters, multiple short stories, and delicate emotional descriptions.

■ The game contains some bloody content and scary elements, black comedy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
